text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/appointment-cancellation-reason
  • Include all codes defined in http://linuxforhealth.org/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/appointment-cancellation-reason

name: AppointmentCancellationReasonValueSet
title: Appointment Cancellation Reason Value Set
description: Extended set of reasons for the cancellation of an appointment
